posts.title: My First Blog Post
posts.body: Well, this is my first blog post. I hope it lasts. If anything, I'll have learned to code a blog to some extent. I saw this movie called 18x2 Beyond Youthful Days based off a blog post, and it inspired me to start writing my own pieces.

posts.title: Starting Photography
posts.body: This summer, I bought a Fujifilm XS-10 off of eBay. It was definitely a pretty penny, but in my opinion it was worth it in the end.

posts.title: My Future Cafe Recipe Book
posts.body: First and foremost: my matcha latte recipe. I've recently modified the recipe to a point that I would prefer my own to buying one at a cafe.

posts.title: 22 or So Things I Learned at 22
posts.body: I turn 23 this upcoming Sunday, in approximately 5 days. That is quite scary. I'll be in Colorado, maybe on a mountain. I'm not entirely sure

posts.title: Study Abroad Travel Log
posts.body: A comprehensive log of my travels while studying abroad in Singapore Fall of 2023.
